name: Animo (JTGameDesign)
description:
A short game where you climb a tower while going through different mental and physical challenges people go through everyday.

This is my first game I've made, and it's for a school project. 

After you finish playing the game, please fill out this google form:

https://forms.gle/uvqJLSbWGcM76Dak9

Criticism is welcome
